channel.title: CVE Feed for WatchGuard -- AuthPoint Password Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WatchGuard -- AuthPoint Password Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-1417|2024-05-16T17:56:43.521Z -- WatchGuard -- AuthPoint Password Manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in WatchGuard AuthPoint Password Manager on MacOS allows an a adversary with local access to execute code under the context of the AuthPoint Password Manager application. This issue affects AuthPoint Password Manager for MacOS versions before 1.0.6.
